code-md.previewCommand.description: Command id that is being executed after opening.

code-md.snippetTemplate.markdownDescription:
Configure [Liquid template](https://liquidjs.com/tutorials/intro-to-liquid.html) to generate file snippets.

Available properties in each element of `files`:
* `uri`: Standard [Uri](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#Uri).
* `relativePath`: Path relative to the workspace root.
* `diagnostics`: [Diagnostic](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#Diagnostic).
* `textDocument`: [TextDocument](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#TextDocument) with an additional `text` property that contains the file contents.`undefined` for non-parsable files such as binaries.
